attributes.additional_details: Shut them down. Women are still being seen as property. If you're paying someone for sexual dances and or sex that is basically slavery. The women that dance in these places have 0 dignity and make other women worry for their relationships and marriages. It's vile.
attributes.background: I think strip clubs should be shut down worldwide not just England. It is degrading and can be heartbreaking to the partners of the clients attending.
